Quick Start¶

Basic installation:

pip install pyflow-acdc

Basic usage:

import pyflow_acdc as pyf

#Use pre saved grids to familiarize yourself with the package
[grid,res]=pyf.PEI_grid()

pyf.ACDC_sequential(grid,QLimit=False)


res.All()
